Text:
@@ Malik saheb , 

Thanks for this, aaj kal naye alfaaz doondne mushkil ho gaye hai aapki tarif karne ke liye , really you are alone in this world . We would never forget you for your free service. 

Aapka dosra song doondna padega kyon ki wo iss film ka nahin hai . Koshish karonga wo bhi mil jaye , agar mila to meri khusnasibi hogi. 

Please give us one day time to convert it from LP record to mp3 , it will be mailed to u on maliktpb@.

@@ Malik Saheb , 

Thanks for this rare film , Ab to alfaaz kam pad gaye hai aapki tarif me kehne ke liye , you will be always remembered for your free service . Really you are unique in this world . 

@ Aapka dosra nagma iss film ka nahin hai , film ka naam doond rahe hai , agar ye bhi aapko bhej paya to meri khushnasibi hogi , 

Give us one day time to convert "kaise kahen"  from LP record to mp3. it will be mailed on maliktpb

Saheb nazar movie abhi nahin mili hai mujko Sorry
zabardast film hai sirjee..a true classic!!amazing how you find these rare gems

Iska toh koyee jawab nahin Malikjee, Vhs ko sambhal ke rakhna bahut hi mushkil hai, meri toh 99 p.c. destroyed ho gayee hai, aap ne toh kamal kar deeya, thx a load for this super rare movie, cheers :)
